<a id="OccluderPolygon2D"></a>

# OccluderPolygon2D

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Defines a 2D polygon for LightOccluder2D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Editor facility that helps you draw a 2D polygon used as resource for [LightOccluder2D](LightOccluder2D.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **CullMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode)

<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_constant_CULL_DISABLED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode) **CULL_DISABLED** = `0`

Culling is disabled. See [cull_mode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#OccluderPolygon2D_property_cull_mode).<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_constant_CULL_CLOCKWISE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode) **CULL_CLOCKWISE** = `1`

Culling is performed in the clockwise direction. See [cull_mode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#OccluderPolygon2D_property_cull_mode).<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_constant_CULL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode) **CULL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE** = `2`

Culling is performed in the counterclockwise direction. See [cull_mode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#OccluderPolygon2D_property_cull_mode).<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_property_closed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **closed** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#OccluderPolygon2D_property_closed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_closed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_closed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, closes the polygon. A closed OccluderPolygon2D occludes the light coming from any direction. An opened OccluderPolygon2D occludes the light only at its outline's direction.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_property_cull_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode) **cull_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#OccluderPolygon2D_property_cull_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cull_mode**\ (\ value\: [CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode)\ )
- [CullMode](OccluderPolygon2D.md#enum_OccluderPolygon2D_CullMode) **get_cull_mode**\ (\ )

The culling mode to use.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OccluderPolygon2D_property_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **polygon** = `PackedVector2Array()` [ðŸ”—](#OccluderPolygon2D_property_polygon)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_polygon**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_polygon**\ (\ )

A [Vector2](Vector2.md) array with the index for polygon's vertices positions.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) for more details.
